entry.source: I registered your exchange with that accented{F801}manager as a quest. So someone named Tayama is{F801}waiting for you at the {F804,5}Hills Building in Roppongi,{F804,0}{F801}huh? I hope your fellow Samurai is safe.{F801}
entry.target: I registered your exchange with that accented{F801}manager as a quest. So someone named Tayama is{F801}waiting for you at the {F804,5}Hills Building in Roppongi,{F804,0}{F801}huh? I hope your fellow Samurai is safe.{F801}
